*.description: May see CI status results for all repositories
May modify and set CI status results for all repositories

readCIStatus.description: May read status tags from CI servers

writeCIStatus.description: May set status tags for CI servers

CIStatusAllSuccessRule.name: All CI status successful
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.description: Check if all retrieved CI status messages are successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.success: A sufficient number of CI status messages are successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.failed: At least one CI status is not successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.obstacle: At least one CI status is not successful.

CIStatusXSuccessRule.name: X CI-Status messages
CIStatusXSuccessRule.description: Verify that at least {{ numberOfSuccessful }} CI-Status messages are successful.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.success: A sufficient number of CI-Status messages are successful.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.failed: Only {{ current }} of {{ expected }} required successful CI-Status messages present.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.obstacle: Not enough successful CI-Status messages available.

numberOfSuccessful.label: Quantity
numberOfSuccessful.helpText: Minimum number of successful CI-Status messages.
numberOfSuccessful.errorMessage: The value must be bigger than 0.

CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.name: Named CI-Status successful
CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.description: The CI-Status with name '{{ name }}' of type '{{ type }}' must be successful.
CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.success: The CI-Status {{ type }}:{{ name }} is successful.

failed.CiStatusNotSuccessful: The CI-Status {{ type }}:{{ name }} is not successful.
failed.CiStatusMissing: The CI-Status {{ type }}:{{ name }} is missing.

obstacle.CiStatusNotSuccessful: The named CI-Status is not successful.
obstacle.CiStatusMissing: The named CI-Status is not available.

type.label: Type
type.errorMessage: This field must not be blank.

name.label: Name
name.helpText: The name of the CI-Status (e.g. 'test' or 'build')
name.errorMessage: This field must not be blank.

CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.name: All CI-Status of type successful
CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.description: All CI-Status messages of type '{{ type }}' must be successful.
CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.success: All CI-Status messages of type '{{ type }}' are successful.

failed.CiStatusNotSuccessful: Not all CI-Status messages of type '{{ type }}' are successful. The status '{{ name }}' failed.
failed.CiStatusMissing: No CI-Status messages of type '{{ type }}' present.

obstacle.CiStatusNotSuccessful: Not all CI-Status messages of the given type are successful.
obstacle.CiStatusMissing: No CI-Status messages of the given type present.

type.label: Type
type.errorMessage: This field must not be blank.
